column5: Copied or moved a file or folder
column6: Used a copy and paste tool to duplicate or move information within a document
column7: Sent e-mail with attached file, such as a document, picture or video
column8: Used a basic arithmetic formula in a spreadsheet
column9: Connected and installed a new device, such as a modem, camera or printer

column14: Performed at least one out of nine activities
